snippet: BENISCH--Barbara. April 21, 1928 - March 28, 2016. Beloved daughter, sister and aunt. Lifelong resident of Forest Hills, NY. Graduate of Miss Beard's School, 1945 and Cornell University, 1949. Daughter of the late Catharine E. Benisch and Henry J. Benisch. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to: Cornell Annual Fund for Human Ecology, Cornell University, P.O. Box 25842, Lehigh Valley, PA 18003-9692. 1/3
